item.title: lighttpd 1.4.64 update
item.description: With merge of PR #8390 we updated lighttpd to the latest version 1.4.64 which removed support for the deprecated option server.set-v6only

item.title: New Website
item.description: A keen eye may have noticed that things look a bit different. We have a new Website and a different logo. It's not a new Logo just one that was hidden on the old website for a long time.

item.title: OpenIndiana Hipster 2021.04 is here
item.description: After another 6 months have passed we are proud to announce the release of our 2021.04 snapshot. The images are available at the usual place. As usual we have automatically received all updates that have been integrated into illumos-gate. This releaseâ€™s most notably changes are

item.title: OpenIndiana Hipster 2021.10 is here
item.description: Another 6 months have passed and we are proud to announce the release of our 2021.10 snapshot. The images are available at the usual place.

item.title: OpenIndiana 2021.12 SPARC pre-release
item.description: A new prerelease version of OpenIndiana Hipster 2021.12 for SPARC is available for testing. Note that this is not an official release of the OpenIndiana project. With your help, it could become one!

item.title: OpenIndiana Hipster 2022.10 is here
item.description: As you may already have noticed we have released new ISO and USB images for OpenIndiana Hipster some days ago. As usual we have received many updates via illumos-gate, eg. the latest Intel and AMD CPU microcode updates, the latest time zone changes and lots of enhancements for BHyVe and the internal SMB server.

item.title: Release of 2023.04
item.description: It is my great pleasure to announce the Release of OpenIndiana 2023.04. If you want to know what all has changed in the almost 2000 Commits since last release click here.

item.title: Security Release 2023.05
item.description: Sometimes you release late and sometimes in quick succession. This time unfortunately because of a security issue. UPGRADE NOW!!!

item.title: Release 2023.10
item.description: The closing of this year brings with it our newest Release. We are happy to announce OpenIndiana 2023.10

item.title: perl-5.22 and -5.24 have been obsoleted
item.description: Our perl versions were outdated for quite some time. Finally the old versions have been replaced with 5.34 and 5.36.
